name: TeleCube (Kamx)
description:
-*IMPORTANT*-  Hey if you have a time please watch my 1:30 minute-long Tutorial video (my in-game tutorial sucks a lot) - 

You play as a little cute cube that can teleport, your only mission is to avoid Flappy Bird's like platforms but there is a twist some of the platforms can teleport too (exactly this platforms just swapping places but they are swapping places using Teleportation Power!!!). There are some more types of Platforms but I don't wanna spoil anything more (You can always play :) 

Music: "Magic" & "Asset House" by Six Umbrellas
From https://freemusicarchive.org
CC BY NC

Menu Icons: "Simple icon pastel tone" by astr99 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-icon-pastel-tone-10756...
